reviews.title: Outstanding battery life!
reviews.comment: I've been using these for 3 months now and the 60-hour battery claim is absolutely true. Perfect for long trips and daily commute. The magnetic earbuds are super convenient.

reviews.title: Good value for money
reviews.comment: Sound quality is decent for the price. The neckband design is comfortable for long hours. Only complaint is that bass could be better.

reviews.title: Average sound quality
reviews.comment: The battery life is impressive but sound quality is just okay. Good for calls but not great for music lovers.

reviews.title: Perfect for workouts
reviews.comment: IPX7 rating works perfectly. I use these during intense gym sessions and they never slip. Fast charging is a bonus!

reviews.title: Comfortable fit
reviews.comment: Very lightweight and comfortable. The dual pairing feature is useful when switching between phone and laptop.

reviews.title: Connectivity issues
reviews.comment: Frequently disconnects from my phone. Had to return and get a replacement. Build quality seems inconsistent.

reviews.title: Great for the price
reviews.comment: 45-hour battery life is amazing. The metallic finish looks premium. ANC works well in noisy environments.

reviews.title: Decent earbuds
reviews.comment: Sound is okay, nothing exceptional. The case feels a bit flimsy but earbuds fit well in ears.

reviews.title: Excellent bass response
reviews.comment: The 13mm drivers really deliver! Bass is punchy without being overwhelming. Perfect for electronic music.

reviews.title: Poor call quality
reviews.comment: Music sounds fine but call quality is terrible. People can't hear me clearly even with ENx technology.

reviews.title: Stylish and functional
reviews.comment: Love the midnight black color and metallic finish. Low latency mode works great for gaming.

reviews.title: Battery drains faster than claimed
reviews.comment: Doesn't quite reach 45 hours as advertised. More like 35-40 hours with moderate usage.

reviews.title: IWP Technology is brilliant!
reviews.comment: Instant pairing is so convenient. Just open the case and they connect immediately. IPX4 rating gives confidence during workouts.

reviews.title: Solid performance
reviews.comment: Good sound quality and comfortable fit. The 30-hour battery life is sufficient for my daily needs.

reviews.title: Fast charging works well
reviews.comment: Quick 15-minute charge gives hours of playback. 10mm drivers provide balanced audio across all frequencies.

reviews.title: Average build quality
reviews.comment: Feels a bit cheap for the price. Sound is decent but not exceptional. Case lid feels loose after few months.

reviews.title: Perfect for daily use
reviews.comment: These have become my daily drivers. Comfortable for long hours and never had any connectivity issues.

reviews.title: Left earbud stopped working
reviews.comment: After 4 months, left earbud completely died. Customer service was unhelpful. Not worth the money.

reviews.title: ASAP charging is impressive
reviews.comment: 10 minutes of charging gives 3-4 hours of playback. Very convenient for busy schedules. Sound quality is good too.

reviews.title: Excellent value proposition
reviews.comment: 42-hour battery life is no joke! Perfect for long flights and travel. IPX4 rating gives peace of mind.

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.comment: Decent earbuds for the price range. Nothing exceptional about sound quality but gets the job done.

reviews.title: Comfortable for long hours
reviews.comment: Can wear these for 6-8 hours without any discomfort. Good for office calls and music during work.

reviews.title: Reliable Bluetooth connection
reviews.comment: Bluetooth 5.0 provides stable connection. No audio lag while watching videos. Good overall package.

reviews.title: Case hinge broke
reviews.comment: The charging case hinge broke after 3 months of normal use. Build quality needs improvement for this price.

reviews.title: Premium build quality
reviews.comment: Feels more expensive than it actually is. The ASAP charging is super fast and battery lasts for days.

reviews.title: Great for music lovers
reviews.comment: Sound signature is well balanced. Good separation between instruments. Perfect for classical and jazz music.

reviews.title: Water resistance works
reviews.comment: Got caught in rain while jogging. Earbuds worked perfectly fine. IPX4 rating is genuine.

reviews.title: Touch controls are finicky
reviews.comment: Sometimes touch controls don't respond properly. Have to tap multiple times to pause/play music.

reviews.title: Best in this price range
reviews.comment: Compared with other brands in similar price. These are clearly superior in terms of battery and build quality.

reviews.title: Charging case issues
reviews.comment: Earbuds charge fine but the case itself doesn't hold charge properly. Disappointing for the price paid.

reviews.title: Exceptional audio quality
reviews.comment: The 10mm drivers really shine here. Clear highs, punchy mids, and deep bass. Worth every penny!

reviews.title: Long lasting battery
reviews.comment: 42-hour claim is pretty accurate. I charge once a week with moderate daily usage. Very convenient.

reviews.title: Stable Bluetooth connection
reviews.comment: Never experienced any connectivity drops. Bluetooth 5.0 works flawlessly even at good distances.

reviews.title: Perfect fit and comfort
reviews.comment: Comes with multiple ear tip sizes. Found the perfect fit that doesn't fall out even during running.

reviews.title: Good but pricey
reviews.comment: Quality is good but feels overpriced compared to other boAt models. Features are similar.

reviews.title: Great for gym sessions
reviews.comment: Sweat proof and stays in place during intense workouts. Sound quality remains consistent.

reviews.title: 70H battery is incredible
reviews.comment: The battery life claim is true! I've been using for 2 weeks and charged only once. 40mm drivers provide rich sound.

reviews.title: Heavy for long use
reviews.comment: Sound quality is good and battery lasts forever, but gets uncomfortable after 2-3 hours of continuous use.

reviews.title: ENC mic works perfectly
reviews.comment: The Zen™ ENC mic is outstanding for calls. People say they can hear me crystal clear even in noisy environments.

reviews.title: Build quality issues
reviews.comment: The headband adjustment mechanism broke after 2 months. Not worth the price for this build quality.

reviews.title: 4 EQ modes are useful
reviews.comment: Love the different EQ settings. Gaming mode enhances footsteps in FPS games. Music mode is well balanced.

reviews.title: IPX5 rating works
reviews.comment: Used during monsoon and light rain. No damage to the headphones. However, comfort could be better.

reviews.title: ANC is impressive for the price
reviews.comment: 25dB ANC works really well. Can barely hear traffic noise during commute. 40H battery is a bonus.

reviews.title: Great value for money
reviews.comment: Compared to other ANC earbuds in this price range, these are clearly superior. Comfortable fit too.

reviews.title: ANC could be better
reviews.comment: The noise cancellation is decent but not as good as premium brands. Good for the price though.

reviews.title: Low latency gaming works
reviews.comment: Gaming mode reduces audio delay noticeably. Perfect for mobile gaming. 13mm drivers sound good.

reviews.title: Touch controls are terrible
reviews.comment: Touch controls are too sensitive. Accidentally pause music just by adjusting the earbuds. Very annoying.

reviews.title: Perfect for office use
reviews.comment: ANC helps me focus in noisy office environment. Call quality is excellent with quad mic ENC.

reviews.title: Eye strain reduced significantly
reviews.comment: After using these for 2 months, my eye strain has reduced dramatically. Perfect for long coding sessions.

reviews.title: Lightweight and comfortable
reviews.comment: TR90 frame is incredibly light. Can wear for 8+ hours without any nose bridge pressure. Great quality.

reviews.title: Good blue light protection
reviews.comment: The yellow tint in lenses effectively filters blue light. Sleep quality has improved after using these.

reviews.title: Slight color distortion
reviews.comment: Blue light blocking works but colors look slightly yellowish. Takes time to get used to the tint.

reviews.title: Perfect for remote work
reviews.comment: Essential for anyone working on computers all day. Reduced headaches and improved focus significantly.

reviews.title: Nose pads are uncomfortable
reviews.comment: The glasses slip down frequently and nose pads leave marks. Not suitable for extended wear.

reviews.title: Classic Ray-Ban quality
reviews.comment: Iconic design never goes out of style. Build quality is exceptional and UV protection is top-notch.

reviews.title: Perfect fit and style
reviews.comment: These look amazing and fit perfectly. The green lenses provide excellent contrast and clarity.

reviews.title: Durable and stylish
reviews.comment: Had these for over a year now. No scratches on lenses and frame still looks new. Worth the investment.

reviews.title: Comfortable for all day wear
reviews.comment: Can wear these for hours without any pressure points. The acetate frame is lightweight yet sturdy.

reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
reviews.comment: Premium pricing but you get what you pay for. Quality is undeniable though other brands offer similar features for less.

reviews.title: Timeless design
reviews.comment: The Wayfarer design is timeless. These sunglasses complement every outfit and face shape perfectly.
